allow: Bash(powershell -Command "& python -c ''from alembic.config import Config; from alembic import command; cfg = Config\(""alembic.ini""\); command.upgrade\(cfg, ""head""\)''")

Bash("/c/Users/Murilo/Desktop/Projects/Report_Terra/.venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "from alembic.config import Config; from alembic import command; cfg = Config\(''alembic.ini''\); command.upgrade\(cfg, ''head''\)")

Bash("/c/Users/Murilo/Desktop/Projects/Report_Terra/.venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
import sqlite3
db_path = ''c:/Users/Murilo/Desktop/Projects/Report_Terra/backend/data/report_terra.db''
conn = sqlite3.connect\(db_path\)
cur = conn.cursor\(\)

# Check existing columns
cur.execute\(''PRAGMA table_info\(users\)''\)
cols = [row[1] for row in cur.fetchall\(\)]
print\(''Current columns:'', cols\)

# Add role column if not exists
if ''role'' not in cols:
    cur.execute\(""ALTER TABLE users ADD COLUMN role TEXT DEFAULT ''user''""\)
    print\(''Added: role''\)
else:
    print\(''role already exists''\)

# Add can_generate_report column if not exists
if ''can_generate_report'' not in cols:
    cur.execute\(''ALTER TABLE users ADD COLUMN can_generate_report INTEGER DEFAULT 0''\)
    print\(''Added: can_generate_report''\)
else:
    print\(''can_generate_report already exists''\)

# Update admin user
cur.execute\(""UPDATE users SET role=''admin'', can_generate_report=1 WHERE email=''admin@reportterra.com''""\)
print\(f''Updated admin: {cur.rowcount} row\(s\)''\)

conn.commit\(\)
conn.close\(\)
print\(''Done.''\)
")
